name: Ready2Respond
summary: Developed by SQLearn in partnership with SINTEF Digital, Ready2Respond XR app aims to bridge the gap between theoretical knowledge and practical skills in the maritime sector. XR gives an opportunity for a different, innovative educational tool that can be easily adopted and used by the students of naval schools in Greece and Norway.  The training aim is to target aspects that they haven’t been taught during their mandatory public education.  One of the key features of Ready2Respond is its gamified...
